definition: see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: Before you conceive, see your health care provider for a physical exam.
sentences.chinese: 在你懷孕以前，讓醫療服務人員爲你做一次身體檢查。

sentences.english: The study conducted physical examinations of thousands of people over the course of 30 years at regular intervals.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員在30年的時間內定期給幾千人做身體檢查。

sentences.english: When I turned 50, I had a complete physical checkup.
sentences.chinese: 當我50歲時，我給自己做了一次全面的身體檢查。

sentences.english: They paid for a check-up for the whole family.
sentences.chinese: 全家人的定期身體檢查費用都由他們支付。

sentences.english: The deal is likely to be completed tomorrow and is pending a physical.
sentences.chinese: 這項交易可能明天完成並且緊接著身體檢查。

sentences.english: In the meantime, the baby was given blood and urine tests and a physical examination.
sentences.chinese: 同時，嬰兒也需要接受血液和尿液的檢查和身體檢查。

sentences.english: The doctor gave WangSi made physical examinations, found that she is pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 醫生給王思作了身體檢查，發現她懷孕了。

sentences.english: He agrees to examine her at the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 帕司若同意在餐館對她做個身體檢查。

sentences.english: Ralph unbuttons his shirt and the doctor carries out the physical examination.
sentences.chinese: 洛夫解開他的襯衫，醫生做身體檢查。

sentences.english: Ms Haddix has just one medical test to pass before she is mobilised .
sentences.chinese: 哈迪克絲夫人在調動之前僅需通過一項身體檢查。

sentences.english: On physical exam, the liver may be stony hard.
sentences.chinese: 身體檢查，肝會象石一樣硬。

definition: (Tw) medical checkup/physical examination (abbr. for 健康檢查|健康检查[jian4 kang1 jian3 cha2])
see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists
to transfer (a patient for treatment in a different hospital)
